section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The Term of the contract is not defined, as the time is redacted. Without this information, it is difficult to determine the obligations of both parties.

section: Notwithstanding paragraphs 4A, 4B and 4C above, CONSULTANT shall be entitled to endorse and play the [*****]. The parties expressly agree that CONSULTANT may permit [*****] the use of CONSULTANT'S name and/or likeness in [*****] print and/or television advertisement provided that this is executed in a manner consistent with [*****] past [*****] advertising practice using similarly situated professional golfers with competing golf club endorsement agreements that include [*****]. If [*****] use of CONSULTANT varies from past practice of utilizing similarly situated professionals, CONSULTANT will take action to remedy the situation [*****]. If CONSULTANT participates directly in any [*****] sponsored photo shoots for advertising or PR, CONSULTANT shall wear his ADAMS GOLF [*****]. The parties further expressly agree that CONSULTANT'S endorsement of the [*****] shall not include the right to place a [*****] logo on his ADAMS GOLF [*****] or the ADAMS GOLF [*****]. If CONSULTANT'S relationship with [*****] terminates during this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall be permitted to replace the [*****] endorsement with another [*****] endorsement under the same terms and conditions expressed herein.
explanation: The text is structurally flawed and uses redactions that makes the information presented not properly structured. Because the text is not properly structured the purpose is not evident. The entire meaning of the paragraphs are not evident.

section: If CONSULTANT participates directly in any [*****] sponsored photo shoots for advertising or PR, CONSULTANT shall wear his ADAMS GOLF [*****]. The parties further expressly agree that CONSULTANT'S endorsement of the [*****] shall not include the right to place a [*****] logo on his ADAMS GOLF [*****] or the ADAMS GOLF [*****].
explanation: This section is structurally flawed, with redactions that impact its readability and logical flow. The redactions prevent a clear understanding of the obligations and restrictions regarding the consultant's attire and logo placement during promotional activities.

section:
In each and every calendar year of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games). If for any reason, CONSULTANT should achieve a satisfactory record of play in less than [*****] SPGA and/or PGA tour events in a calendar year, he shall repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event for each event under [*****] achieved in the given calendar year as follows:
The agreed upon repayment amount per event per calendar year:
1. Year 1. $[*****]
2. Year 2 $[*****]
3. Year 3 $[*****]
4. Year 4 $[*****]
5. Year 5 $[*****]
explanation: The lack of specific numbers impacts the ability to enforce this provision. It creates ambiguity regarding the consultant's minimum performance requirements and the exact amount of repayment owed for failing to meet those requirements.

section: During the term of this Agreement, ADAMS GOLF shall provide CONSULTANT with [*****] sets of clubs for CONSULTANT'S family and friends each calendar year of this Agreement.
explanation: The number of club sets to be provided is redacted, making it unclear exactly what ADAMS GOLF is obligated to provide. The exact number should be specified.

section: For the entire term of this Agreement, from September 1, 2004 through [*****] ADAMS GOLF shall pay CONSULTANT a base compensation of [*****] dollars. The base compensation shall be paid [*****].
explanation: The compensation, end date, and payment schedule is redacted, which makes it difficult to define all the obligations of ADAMS GOLF. Compensation and schedule for payments needs to be specified for the obligations to be realized.

section: ADAMS GOLF must exercise its right of termination within ninety (90) days of its senior management becoming aware of the conduct giving rise to the right of termination.
explanation: This section states that the right to terminate must be exercised within ninety days of senior management learning of the conduct, this is ambigious, because it fails to specify the process for Adams Golf to follow when it wants to terminate the contract. This is a violation of national laws when it comes to legal documents.

section: Prior to publishing or placing any advertising or promotional material which uses CONSULTANT'S name, facsimile signature, nickname, voice or likeness, ADAMS GOLF shall submit the same to CONSULTANT, or CONSULTANT'S designee, for approval, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed. If CONSULTANT disapproves, the reasons therefore shall be given to ADAMS GOLF in writing within three (3) business days or shall be deemed approved.
explanation: This section states that if the consultant fails to disapprove within three business days, it will be deemed approved. However, it fails to specify the process for CONSULTANT to follow when disapproving of an advertisement.
